text: anybody here familiar with the file format used by the registry who can verify that <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/28451> is correct (i.e., does what it claims, as described in there)?

text: A possible sanity check is to locally make a new version with the compat bound you want and see what LocalRegistry does with it.
